subject: Pit house problem
description_text:
Hello, I am sending you this message because I am experiencing a small inconvenience with the pit house.
I launch the PC then the game LMU, but I am forced to launch the Simsonn pit house and reload the settings for it to be operational, whereas before I didn't need to do that.

Sincerely, Mr. Forestier David

conversations.body_text: Hi David Forestier,    Please follow the steps below:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX main controller, then reconnect the USB cable.    Open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 and check if it has entered recovery mode.    If recovery mode is detected, go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu.    After the update is complete, test the device to see if it has been restored successfully.

Hello, I'm giving you an update. I followed the procedure you sent me and it resolved my problem.
Thank you again for your speed and clear explanations.

Good luck to the whole team and especially have a great holiday season.

Sincerely, Mr. Forestier David

Thu. Dec 11, 2025, 08:02, service@simsonn.com
